text: ivaiyellam verum peyarkalanri verillai, ninkalum unkal mutataiyarkalum vaittuk konta verum peyarkal! Itarku allah enta attatciyum irakkavillai, niccayamaka avarkal vinana ennattaiyum, tam manankal virumpupavarraiyume pin parrukirarkal, eninum niccayamaka avarkalutaiya iraivanitamiruntu, avarkalukku nerana vali vante irukkiratu
